Based on your preferences for war-themed stories, I would recommend "Braveheart" and "The Patriot". 

Both movies are set during World War II and feature intense battle scenes, political intrigue, and personal sacrifices.

While both movies focus on the war effort, "Braveheart" offers a more emotional and character-driven portrayal of war, while "The Patriot" is more focused on action and spectacle.

Overall, if you're looking for epic battle sequences, political intrigue, and personal sacrifice during World War II, then I would highly recommend checking out both "Braveheart" and "The Patriot".
